metadata.title: CVE-2013-2133 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The EJB invocation handler implementation in Red Hat JBossWS, as used inJBoss Enterprise Application Platform (EAP) before 6.2.0, does not properlyenforce the method level restrictions for JAX-WS Service endpoints, whichallows remote authenticated users to access otherwise restricted JAX-WShandlers by leveraging permissions to the EJB class.

criterions.comment: jbossas4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
